snippet: Shares rose after data on the manufacturing sector offered evidence of a faster economic recovery.
abstract: Shares rise after data on the manufacturing sector offers evidence of a faster economic recovery than expected, easing anxiety about a slowdown.
lead_paragraph: Shares rose after data on the manufacturing sector offered evidence of a faster economic recovery.

headline.main: Blue Chips Lead the Way As Major Indexes Close Higher
headline.print_headline: Blue Chips Lead the Way As Major Indexes Close Higher
